block.description: If specified, replaces the placed block with the block that has the specified namespace and ID.
block.markdownDescription: If specified, replaces the placed block with the block that has the specified namespace and ID.

block_state.description: If specified, replaces the placed block with the block that has the specified namespace, ID and block state.
block_state.markdownDescription: If specified, replaces the placed block with the block that has the specified namespace, ID and block state.

blocks.description: If specified, replaces the placed block with the blocks that has the specified namespace and IDs in a random fashion.
blocks.markdownDescription: If specified, replaces the placed block with the blocks that has the specified namespace and IDs in a random fashion.

block_states.description: If specified, replaces the placed block with the blocks that has the specified namespace, ID and block state in a random fashion.
block_states.markdownDescription: If specified, replaces the placed block with the blocks that has the specified namespace, ID and block state in a random fashion.

block_action.description: If specified, executes the specified action at the placed block.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, executes the specified action at the placed block.

item_condition.description: The block item used for placing a block.
item_condition.markdownDescription: The block item used for placing a block.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Modifies the placed block upon placing one.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_block_placed`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Modifies the placed block upon placing one.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_block_placed`
